kv2.3:16.11_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.3:16.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
kv2.3:16.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
kv2.3:16.6_0: They truly understand form: ‘Is form’ ... ‘This is the origin of form.’
kv2.3:16.8_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
kv2.3:17.11_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.3:17.4_0: “Mendicants, I say that the ending of defilements is for one who knows and sees, not for one who does not know or see.
kv2.3:17.5_0: For one who knows and sees what?
kv2.3:17.6_0: ‘This is suffering’ ... ‘This is the origin of suffering’ ... ‘This is the cessation of suffering’ ... ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering’.
kv2.3:17.7_0: ‘This is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.’
kv2.3:17.8_0: The ending of the defilements is for one who knows and sees this.”
kv2.3:18.4_0: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding all, without dispassion for it and giving it up, you can’t end suffering.
kv2.3:18.5_0: By directly knowing and completely understanding the all, having dispassion for it and giving it up, you can end suffering.”
kv2.3:18.8_0: And they should not correct them like this:
kv2.3:19.5_0: and unable to make six grave crimes.”

kv2.3:9.5_0: They’ve given up greed, hate, and delusion, cut them off at the root, made them like a palm stump, obliterated them, so they’re unable to arise in the future.
